snippet: Exactly a year after police in China locked him up for 81 days, the artist Ai Weiwei has set up a Web site showing feeds from four live webcams in his Beijing home, in reference to the 24-hour police surveillance he has been subjected to since his...
abstract: Exactly a year after police in China locked him up for 81 days, the artist Ai Weiwei has set up a Web site showing feeds from four live webcams in his Beijing home, in reference to the 24-hour police surveillance he has been subjected to since his detention.

headline.main: Ai Weiwei Takes His Surveillance Worldwide
headline.print_headline: You, Along With Police, Can Watch Ai Weiwei
